analysis.description:
PeonyToken.toRecord (/unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol#283-297) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-record.record(_from,_to) (/unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol#293-295)

PeonyToken.toRecord has external calls inside a loop:
	- record.record(_from,_to) (/unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol#293-295)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol#18-19): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of PeonyToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/26/0xdd2b28602e0a31b82e25c75e065d2e2e8247e9ec.sol#265) is not in mixedCase
